title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama project: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Works in Node.js, browsers, and Bun.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Exposes chat, embedding, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI). ChatGPT-style interface, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama. Async-first, tokio-based.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Go CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with colored output and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes for using Ollama with Python, JS, Go, Rust, Docker, K8s, etc.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial)
summary: Lightweight npm wrapper around Ollama REST API (community-maintained).

title: ollama-py (PyPI mirror)
summary: Official PyPI package for ollama-python client.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama. REST client with ActiveModel-like DSL.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to Discord slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that test code against Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit app for RAG-powered chat over local documents using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in Slack threads.
